alert.note: Alert for Brown; Campbell; McPherson; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:17PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Brown, Campbell, McPherson and northern Walworth Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 9 miles west of Lisbon to 8 miles south of Merricourt City to near Artas. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forbes, Eureka and Elm Lake. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
